title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 251: Featuring Elliotte Friedman
description:
On Monday’s episode of Spittin’ Chiclets the guys are joined by Elliotte Friedman, NHL Insider for Sportsnet. Elliotte joins (54:45) to talk about the trade deadline, some rumors he is hearing and what goes into breaking a deal at the deadline. He also brings up the potential for an offer sheet for Mat Barzal this summer. The guys also talk some NHL news, discussing Mika Zibanejad, the Islanders, Coronavirus and more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
